content.rendered: Isaac’s new room – November 2015. I’m not sure how we fitted in this redecoration project, but we did. It’s green!!!! (There’s a funky blackboard-wall out of view too). He’s taken to it really well and is sleeping in there on the first night after we finished it. YAY!!!
